title: 88/552/EEC: Commission Decision of 19 October 1988 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Belgium pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
OF 19 OCTOBER 1988
ON IMPROVING THE EFFICIENCY OF AGRICULTURAL STRUCTURES IN BELGIUM PURSUANT TO COUNCIL REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 797/85
( ONLY THE FRENCH AND DUTCH TEXTS ARE AUTHENTIC )
( 88/552/EEC )
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: TAKING INTO ACCOUNT THE PROVISIONS RELATING TO THE FIXATION OF THE REFERENCE INCOME FOR 1988, THE MEASURES ADOPTED BY BELGIUM PURSUANT TO REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 797/85 CONTINUE TO MEET THE CONDITIONS FOR A FINANCIAL CONTRIBUTION FROM THE COMMUNITY TO THE COMMON MEASURE PROVIDED FOR IN ARTICLE 1 OF REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 797/85 .
THIS DECISION IS ADDRESSED TO THE KINGDOM OF BELGIUM .
attachments:
DONE AT BRUSSELS, 19 OCTOBER 1988 .
FOR THE COMMISSION
FRANS ANDRIESSEN
VICE-PRESIDENT
